mapper.sql: id, cont_no, apply_date, apply_time, user_id, user_name, id_no, mobile, user_credit_line, product_id, product_type, product_name, promotion_case_id, purpose, apply_amt, approve_amt, apply_term, approve_term, basic_rate, actual_rate, interest, serv_fee, serv_fee_rate, overdue_rate, overdue_fee, repay_freq, repay_unit, term, repay_method, discount, discount_reason, discount_amt, discount_rate, grace_day, org_id, org_name, input_time, operator_id, operator_name, approver_id, approver_name, stage, status, apply_status, approve_result, approve_time, channel_id, saler_id, ext_info, source,company_id, teminal_id, ip, remark, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time, del,call_count,call_time,pay_channel,pay_time,urgent_payed,loan_succ_count

when.test: page !=null and page.orderBy != null and page.orderBy != ''

mapper.select: SELECT id FROM loan_apply WHERE del = 0 AND apply_status IN (0, 2) AND user_id = #{userId}
SELECT COUNT(1) FROM loan_apply WHERE del = 0 AND user_id = #{userId} AND apply_date BETWEEN #{beginDate} AND #{endDate}
SELECT id applyId, stage, status FROM loan_apply WHERE del = 0 AND id = #{applyId}

SELECT
FROM loan_apply WHERE del = 0 AND user_id = #{userId} AND status in(171,210,213,220,223) order by APPROVE_TIME desc limit 1

SELECT
FROM loan_apply WHERE del = 0 AND user_id = #{userId} AND status >= 171

SELECT
FROM loan_apply WHERE del = 0 AND apply_status = 0 AND user_id = #{userId} order by create_time desc limit 1

SELECT
FROM loan_apply WHERE del = 0 AND apply_status IN (0, 2) AND user_id = #{userId} order by create_time desc limit 1

SELECT id, cont_no, apply_time, user_id, user_name, id_no, mobile, apply_amt, apply_term, stage, status FROM loan_apply WHERE del = 0 AND status in ('212', '222') AND user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY apply_date DESC

SELECT id, cont_no, apply_time, user_id, user_name, id_no, mobile, product_id, apply_amt, apply_term, stage, status, update_time FROM loan_apply WHERE del = 0 AND apply_status = 1 AND user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY apply_time DESC LIMIT 1

SELECT id, date_format(apply_time, '%Y-%m-%d') apply_time, approve_amt, approve_term, repay_method, status,apply_status,term,product_name,apply_term FROM loan_apply WHERE del = 0 AND user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY apply_time desc

SELECT
FROM loan_apply
ORDER BY id LIMIT 1

SELECT
FROM loan_apply

SELECT
FROM loan_apply
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO loan_apply( id, cont_no, apply_date, apply_time, user_id, user_name, id_no, mobile, user_credit_line, product_id, product_type, product_name, promotion_case_id, purpose, apply_amt, approve_amt, apply_term, approve_term, basic_rate, actual_rate, interest, serv_fee, serv_fee_rate, overdue_rate, overdue_fee, repay_freq, repay_unit, term, repay_method, discount, discount_reason, discount_amt, discount_rate, grace_day, org_id, org_name, input_time, operator_id, operator_name, approver_id, approver_name, stage, status, apply_status, approve_result, approve_time, channel_id, saler_id, ext_info, source, company_id, teminal_id, loan_succ_count, ip, remark, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time, del, urgent_payed ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{contNo}, #{applyDate}, #{applyTime}, #{userId}, #{userName}, #{idNo}, #{mobile}, #{userCreditLine}, #{productId}, #{productType}, #{productName}, #{promotionCaseId}, #{purpose}, #{applyAmt}, #{approveAmt}, #{applyTerm}, #{approveTerm}, #{basicRate}, #{actualRate}, #{interest}, #{servFee}, #{servFeeRate}, #{overdueRate}, #{overdueFee}, #{repayFreq}, #{repayUnit}, #{term}, #{repayMethod}, #{discount}, #{discountReason}, #{discountAmt}, #{discountRate}, #{graceDay}, #{orgId}, #{orgName}, #{inputTime}, #{operatorId}, #{operatorName}, #{approverId}, #{approverName}, #{stage}, #{status}, #{applyStatus}, #{approveResult}, #{approveTime}, #{channelId}, #{salerId}, #{extInfo}, #{source}, #{companyId}, #{teminalId}, #{loanSuccCount}, #{ip}, #{remark}, #{createBy}, #{createTime}, #{updateBy}, #{updateTime}, #{del}, #{urgentPayed} )
mapper.update:
UPDATE loan_apply SET
stage = #{stage},
status = #{status},
apply_status = #{applyStatus},
pay_time = #{payTime},
update_by = #{updateBy}, update_time = #{updateTime} WHERE id = #{id}

UPDATE loan_apply SET
cont_no = #{contNo},
apply_date = #{applyDate},
apply_time = #{applyTime},
user_id = #{userId},
user_name = #{userName},
id_no = #{idNo},
mobile = #{mobile},
user_credit_line = #{userCreditLine},
product_id = #{productId},
product_type = #{productType},
product_name = #{productName},
promotion_case_id = #{promotionCaseId},
purpose = #{purpose},
apply_amt = #{applyAmt},
approve_amt = #{approveAmt},
apply_term = #{applyTerm},
approve_term = #{approveTerm},
basic_rate = #{basicRate},
actual_rate = #{actualRate},
interest = #{interest},
serv_fee = #{servFee},
SERV_FEE_RATE = #{servFeeRate},
overdue_rate = #{overdueRate},
overdue_fee = #{overdueFee},
repay_freq = #{repayFreq},
repay_unit = #{repayUnit},
term = #{term},
repay_method = #{repayMethod},
discount = #{discount},
discount_reason = #{discountReason},
discount_amt = #{discountAmt},
discount_rate = #{discountRate},
grace_day = #{graceDay},
org_id = #{orgId},
org_name = #{orgName},
input_time = #{inputTime},
operator_id = #{operatorId},
operator_name = #{operatorName},
approver_id = #{approverId},
approver_name = #{approverName},
stage = #{stage},
status = #{status},
apply_status = #{applyStatus},
approve_result = #{approveResult},
approve_time = #{approveTime},
channel_id = #{channelId},
saler_id = #{salerId},
ext_info = #{extInfo},
source = #{source},
company_id = #{companyId},
teminal_id = #{teminalId},
ip = #{ip},
remark = #{remark},
update_by = #{updateBy},
update_time = #{updateTime},
pay_channel = #{payChannel},
pay_time = #{payTime},
urgent_payed = #{urgentPayed},
count_user_bind_card_pv = #{countUserBindCardPv},
composite_score = #{compositeScore},
loan_record = #{loanRecord},
update_by = #{updateBy}, update_time = #{updateTime} WHERE id = #{id}

UPDATE loan_apply SET
update_by = #{updateBy},
update_time = #{updateTime},
del = 1 WHERE id = #{id}

UPDATE loan_apply SET
update_by = #{updateBy},
update_time = #{updateTime},
del = 1
mapper.select: SELECT count(1) from loan_apply WHERE user_id =#{userId} and `status`>=511 and del = 0
SELECT count(1) from loan_apply WHERE user_id = #{userId} and `status`IN (611, 612, 711, 811) and del = 0
SELECT count(1) from loan_apply WHERE id =#{id} and del = 0

SELECT SUM(CASE WHEN ap.`approve_result` = 3 || ap.`approve_result` = 4 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) sumTotal, SUM(CASE WHEN ap.`approve_result` = 3 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) apprvTotal, SUM(CASE WHEN ap.`approve_result` = 4 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) notapprvTotal FROM `loan_apply` ap LEFT JOIN sys_user u ON
ap.operator_id = u.id
ap.approver_id = u.id
WHERE
ap.operator_id != 'system'
ap.approver_id != 'system'
and
ap.operator_id in
ap.approver_id in
#{item}
and ap.approve_time >= #{startDate} and ap.approve_time <= #{endDate}
mapper.update: UPDATE loan_apply SET approve_term=#{approveTerm} WHERE id =#{id}
mapper.select: SELECT count(*) FROM loan_apply WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND status in(171,210,213,220,223) and del = 0
SELECT count(*) FROM loan_apply WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND apply_status = 0 and del = 0

SELECT
FROM loan_apply WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND apply_status = 0 and del = 0
SELECT sum(approve_amt) FROM loan_apply WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND apply_status = 0 and del = 0
SELECT count(*) FROM loan_apply WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND status in ('212', '222') AND del = 0
SELECT count(*) FROM loan_apply WHERE product_id ='CCD' AND company_id = #{companyId} AND DATE_FORMAT(approve_time, '%Y%m') = #{approveMonth}

SELECT count(*) FROM loan_apply WHERE del = 0 AND apply_status = 0 AND id_no LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{userIdCard}), '%') and user_name=#{userName} and mobile LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{userPhone}), '%')

SELECT
FROM loan_apply WHERE del = 0
AND user_id = #{userId} AND apply_status = 1 and status>=514 and product_id=#{productId}
ORDER BY apply_time DESC LIMIT 1

SELECT
FROM loan_apply WHERE del = 0 AND status = 410
AND apply_time >= DATE_SUB(now(), INTERVAL 7 DAY)
AND approve_time <= DATE_SUB(now(), INTERVAL 60 MINUTE)
AND id not in ( select apply_id from loan_market_management) AND id not in ( select apply_id from loan_borrow_info)
SELECT count(*) FROM loan_apply WHERE del = 0 AND apply_status = 0 AND mobile = #{mobile}
SELECT count(*) FROM loan_apply WHERE del = 0 AND apply_status = 0 AND id_no = #{idNo} AND mobile != #{mobile}
mapper.update:
UPDATE loan_apply SET call_count = #{callNum} , call_time =now()
where id = #{applyId}

UPDATE loan_apply SET
pay_channel = #{payChannel},
pay_time = #{payTime},
stage = #{stage},
status = #{status},
update_by = #{updateBy}, update_time = #{updateTime} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM loan_apply a
ORDER BY a.create_time DESC
SELECT a.* FROM loan_apply a left join cust_user b on a.user_id=b.id where a.del='0' and a.status='410' and b.card_no is null and a.approve_time <= ADDDATE(CURDATE(),1)
